DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate potential effect Granulocyte-Macrophage Stimulating-Colony Factor ( GM-CSF ) supplementation embryo culture patient repeat implantation failure ( RIF )
DOC.detailed_description: 60 patient repeat implantation failure involve . RIF define patient fail conceive ( beta-hCG < 5 mIU/mL ) least 03 embryo transfer ( fresh frozen ) 06 top quality embryo . Ovarian stimulation perform use GnRH antagonist protocol . All mature oocyte inseminate ICSI . Injected oocyte culture medium supplement 2ng/ml GM-CSF ( Embryogen , Origio ) day transfer . Embryo evaluation perform Ô¨Åxed time point 18 44 hour fertilization . Embryo transfer perform 2 day ovum retrieval . Luteal-phase support provide use progesterone gel ( Crinone 8 % 90 mg , twice day ; Merck Serono ) estradiol per o ( Valiera 2mg , twice day ; Laboratorios Recalcine ) . Serum hCG measure 16 day oocyte retrieval , positive , ultrasound scan perform gestational week 7 12 .
DOC.criteria: Normal ovarian reserve ( AMH > 1.1 ng/ml ) Regular menstrual cycle ( 25 34 day ) Clear information least 3 late IVF/ET Fresh embryo transfer cycle Endometrial thickness 10 mm Undergo oocyte donation vitro maturation ( IVM ) cycle Using frozen surgically retrieve sperm Adenomyosis , Uterine anomaly , uterine fibroid , hydrosalpinges In participation studies/interventions
